extendedInfo.description: This workshop allows you to invent and create your own cosmetics. Mix and match your own make up products together and try how they look inside the beauty salon. Have fun playing this extensive game for girls with lots of options! The cosmetics workshop is currently the first online game that allows you to mix and create you own cosmetics online. Try it yourself and disover how easy it is to create your own make up products.Visit the beauty salon and try your creations, see the results in seconds. Have fun! Cosmetics Workshop: This small workshop will allow you to create many different types of cosmetics. Mix and blend all the products together to create a great lipstick. Do not wait to test it! Try it now on your model and decide the result. A lot of combinations. You own a make up laboratory. Try to check and create all kinds of shuffles and then try them on the cute model. The workshop will give you all the tools you need to create your very own cosmetics. In this make up game for girls you can mix and match your own ingredients together and try how they look inside the beauty salon. Be creative, have fun, and discover the next generation cosmetics with ease!Keyword:  Dress Up, Fashion, Fun, Make Up Princess
